subject: Order update
description_text:
Hello, I have made an order for the Plus X pedals but I haven't had an
update in a week. Is the order being processed ? Thank you in advance.

conversations.body_text: Hi Gekos,  Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.

The order number is #SSN4476.

Στις Σάβ 13 Δεκ 2025, 05:00 ο χρήστης support@simsonn.com <
support@simsonn.com> έγραψε:

> Hi Gekos,
>
> Please provide your order number so we can check it for you.
>
>
>

Hi Gekos,    We sincerely apologise for any inconvenience caused. The item is currently out of stock at our German warehouse, but we have arranged an urgent UPS dispatch for you. Delivery is expected on the 21st.
